issue.title: [C++] arrow-dataset pkgconfig is incomplete
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7013](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7013). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Unlike the other \*.pc.in files, it doesn't include a `Libs` field, so passing the result of what is found by pkgconfig results in the lib still not being found.
